item.title: A starter pack for Bioinformatics enthusiasts written in Spanish
item.description: This project was developed as the reference course material of a boot camp organized by RSG Ecuador and iGEM Ecuador, where I was instructor and co-organizer. Figure 1.- Flyer to advertise the bootcamp. Retrieved from https://rsg-ecuador.github.io/unix.bioinfo.rsgecuador/. Summary This project aims to create an open educational resource that introduces important concepts for aspiring Bioinformaticians, written in Spanish. Topics included in this resource are: The basics of GNU/Linux Jupyter Lab Terminal usage Text and file processing command-line tools (i.
